name: Omakase.ai Voice
tagline: Your Voice-Powered Sales Agent. One URL.
description: Omakase.ai Voice turns your website into a Voice-Powered Sales Agent that talks, listens, and recommends while your customers browse. Chatbots suck — they don’t sell. This one does. 8,000+ agents created. Just drop your URL to start for free!

name: Universal Memory MCP
tagline: Your memories, in every LLM you use.
description: Your memories are in ChatGPT... But nowhere else. Universal Memory MCP makes your memories available to every single LLM. No logins or paywall. One command to set it up.

name: Shipable
tagline: AI Agents that deliver mind-blowing experiences.
description: Shipable AI is the complete platform for building & deploying AI Agents for your business to handle different business cases like customer support and drive sales.

name: Gemini 2.5 Flash
tagline: Fast, Efficient AI with Controllable Reasoning
description: Gemini 2.5 Flash, is now in preview, offering improved reasoning while prioritizing speed and cost efficiency for developers.

name: Wonder
tagline: Create websites with Notion -  Blog, Helpdesk, Marketplace
description: Create superfast websites with Notion as your CMS. Go from Notion to Blog, Helpdesk, Documentation, Marketplace or Directory in minutes. Using our AI Designer & AI Developer. Launch production-ready websites in minutes.

name: Shotup AI
tagline: Every Screenshot, Your Photographic Memory
description: Shotup AI learns and remembers your screenshots. Do you have forgotten screenshots buried deep in your photo album? Shotup AI learns and remembers your screenshots. It understands the context—posts, articles, shopping items—and answers anything about them.

name: Picsellia Atlas
tagline: Your vision AI agent to build VisionAI applications
description: Atlas is an open-source Vision AI Agent built into Picsellia, allowing you to interact with visual data using natural language to explore and improve your Image datasets. No code, no hassle. Simplify your computer vision workflows and let Atlas work for you.

name: Product Hunt MCP
tagline: Connect Product Hunt data to any LLM or agent
description: Connect Product Hunt's API to LLMs through the Model Context Protocol. Access posts, collections, topics, users, votes, and comments with Claude Desktop, Cursor, or any MCP client.

name: FriendMap
tagline: Find My Friends got the glow up we all wanted
description: A clutter-free location-sharing app to meet up with friends: - See friends' live locations - Share plans for easy meetups - Stay connected while traveling - Privacy-first: only trusted friends can see you

name: Work with Linear
tagline: Join a company that works with Linear
description: Great talent deserves great tools. The best product teams use Linear to create velocity and build with focus — and they are hiring.

name: Calcium
tagline: Strong Bones & Teeth
description: Calcium tracking on your wrist with daily reminders! Fully standalone (no iPhone required). Seamless Apple Health integration. Zero ads, no login needed, and secure data handling. Minimalist design with tons of watch widgets. Just 5Mb—smaller than a photo!

name: Looking Glass 27" Light Field Display
tagline: A 27" frame to view spacial 3D without any additional device
description: Looking Glass has led the way in headset-free 3D, and now, we’re taking it even further. The Looking Glass 27” Display is our most advanced 3D display yet, completing our full suite of holographic displays that run on iOS devices.

name: Dock Party 3.0
tagline: Spotify+Apple Music visualizer & controls in your macOS dock
description: Turn your macOS Dock into a dynamic light bar that syncs with your music. Display track details and album cover art right beside the Dock. Control music playback with clickable controls that are always visible. Like songs. Or just give your Dock a fresh color.

name: LLM Hydra
tagline: Forum of AI experts. More ideas. Smarter decisions.
description: LLM Hydra - An AI forum where expert personas collaborate to give you new ideas and answer your questions from multiple perspectives. Instead of relying on one AI, ask once and receive insights from many.

name: Your Interviewer
tagline: Ask anyone anything without the awkwardness
description: Create a voice interview link in seconds — no calls, no scheduling. Capture honest, in-depth answers, get instant transcripts, and turn them into content, insights, or decisions. It's the fastest way to scale real conversations, effortlessly.

name: Symvol CV to Video
tagline: Make your profile stand out
description: Transform your CV into a professional video presentation that showcases your experience and highlights your achievements through a compelling story.

name: AnyLLM
tagline: 10+ LLMs at 10x speed. Think we're kidding. Test it now!
description: AnyLLM is here to end overpriced LLM subscriptions! Need LLaMA from Meta? ✅ Want DeepSeek? Always ready! ⚡ Craving Mistral? You got it! 10+ powerful AI models in ONE place! Code smarter. Research faster. Simplify your tasks like a pro! 🚀🧠💻

name: Superwebp
tagline: Free png to webp bulk converter
description: SuperWebP is a fast and FREE online PNG to WebP bulk converter built to simplify your image optimization workflow. Whether you're a web developer, designer, blogger, or marketer, SuperWebP helps you reduce image sizes in seconds without compromising quality.

name: Good Friend
tagline: LinkedIn posts that work DAMN GOOD!
description: Good friend is an AI agent that understand how LinkedIn works, It drafts post ideas based on your existing connections, and the target audience you want to hit. It suggests viral-worthy images and knows exactly what will impress your network.

name: 404 Love Found
tagline: Replaces 404 pages with photos of adoptable pets nearby
description: Website owners: please consider using this project for your 404 pages! We aim to transform the "404 Not Found" pages into opportunities to help adoptable pets find homes. Instead of a blank error page, users will see local pets who need a family.
